profile_positions.description:
Lead, develop and motivate the warehouse team in a healthy and happy work environment (Operations Associate, IAs)
Support DSV with day-to-day customer relation (incl. calling customers for missing / substitute products), if needed
Manage day-to-day OPEX and CAPEX optimization
Master the WH's data to make operational decisions to operate the WH sustainably
Pursue continuous ops improvement in the WH
Correctly report incoming sickness requests & no-shows in relevant system(s), both for WH -Ops and Riders
Responsible for organizing incoming shipments reception
Support WHM with performance reviews (WH Ops and Riders)
Manage workforce utilization on the ground
The guardian of compliance in the WH for riders (helmet, mask, proper (black) clothing, ...)
Welcome / train / onboard new Riders in WH (incl. for example cargo training)
In case of accident; follow up on accident and review on location
Accountable for follow-up (if needed) on needs with Rider Ops / Central for e.g., equipment and bike repair
Responsible for timely trash (waste) management
Ensure the WH is well established in its ecosystem: e.g., with suppliers, customers, neighbours
Responsible for (over)time management of all employees (extending & attesting shifts of previous 1-2 days (WH + Riders), evaluating overtime, ...)
Responsible for on-shift management of non-operational tasks (Dobbi, water tanks, package deliveries)
Responsible for break schedule during shift (WH Ops)
Point of contact, coordinator and motivator of all riders during the shift
Develop the Gorillas culture among riders
Guardian of compliance in the WH for riders (helmet, mask, Black clothes...)
Coordinate with Rider Ops/Central for equipment, and bike repair
Gather and share figures on riders’ operations (delivery time, no show, lateness)
Constantly ensure and assign equipment and charged bikes during shift
Manage order dispatch at the Pick & Pack table
Assign orders to riders - Manage OPH of rider
profile_positions.title: Supervisor

profile_positions.description:
The purpose of Inbound Planning Process is to ensure that the daily Inbound Delivery schedules are planned in a manner to ensure that inbound stock can be received within the SLA, booking slots and any bottlenecks. The flow should be smooth and swift both for the carrier and the operations of the Inbound Team.
●	Required Inputs (requirements for the process)
●	Pre-Alert	Carrier/Vendors
●	Booking Slot	Inbound Planner
●	Customs Documents	Customs
●	T1 Doc Verification	Receiving/Customs
●	Gas Check Inspections	EWS
profile_positions.title: Business Support Coordinator (Inbound planner/ Business Support Coordinator)
Mini Disti Dell project in Waalwijk 1/ Supervisor

profile_positions.description:
Keep all involved parties informed in accordance to approve from of the communication
Check all incoming updates against the warehouse management system to verify internal availability.
Coordinate receiving and processing of all incoming goods (including returns from customers).
Coordinate deliveries of all spare parts confirming content of parcel, quantity and lead time.
Coordinate shipment of damaged part or parts for QA to the final confirmation to the vendor.
Day to day reporting of all shortages, damages, quality issues etc. across all involved parties.
Control of materials availability using CRF and escalating issues to responsible managers.
Checking paperwork upon arrival trucks and couriers
Custom clearance of bonded shipments
Papers / CMR check and signing
Preparing, creating and updating AIDR registration
Report of all shipments issues
Support all projects with a current status of the materials availability.
Checking paperwork upon arrival trucks and couriers
Custom clearance of bonded shipments
Supporting Supervisor position during absences
Manages and submits RMA’s and related queries according to established  guidelines. Ensures and verifies that customer, vendors and OEM’s needs and expectations are met according to agreements in a timely manner.
Works closely with the RMA operations team in scheduling, prioritizing and preparing shipments. Interacts with carriers to coordinate transportation.
Monitors inventory levels enhancing efficient and constant flow of units into and out of the existing stock, keeping accurate records of goods that are ready for shipment.
Ensures proper reconciling of data in customer’s ERP system taking responsibility for its accuracy and completeness.
Generates timely reports and other analysis as required by management and as needed in order to identify trends, comparisons and other relevant information.

profile_positions.description:
To ensure all Manifest Files / Orders are dropped into Production in a timely manner to ensure the Handover date as per the CDM Matrix is met
Perform changes to Manifest File handover date in the respect of notified delays
On hold order monitoring and resolution (Deviation Set up and action, inbound receipt prioritization, missing stock monitoring)
Reject Manifest – Monitoring and correction – release into production
Progress Monitoring and chasing (Replenishment – picking – processing – outbound) Incl. CTO product
Exception Reporting (Backlog Report and Missed Carrier Handover Report)
Troubleshooting – Liaison with ITD (Inbound receipts) and Inventory (Stock Issues)
Supporting Supervisor position during absences
profile_positions.title: Dell Production Planner B2B

profile_positions.description:
Co-ordinate efficient operation of the department & ensure procedures are documented & followed
Monitor staff performance, (including time-keeping, quality, and productivity) and costs within the department.
Provide leadership to staff by establishing clear expectations and acting as a role model
To provide back up and support to the Supervisor and to represent him/her fully in periods of absence (sickness, holiday, business meetings etc) when required
Liaison with all operational departments to ensure smooth work flow & maximum synergy.
Responsible for QEHS within the department & reporting accidents & near misses to Supervisor / Manager
Responsible for 5S within the department
Responsible for providing reports and mail traffic
Supporting Supervisor position during absences
